success.title: Thank you for registering,
success.thanks: You are now correctly enrolled in the CaPeL logbook. Thank you.
success.email: You will receive an e-mail inviting you to activate your account and enter your password.
success.spamWarning: Be sure to check your spam folder or your filtering tools, as some e-mail systems automatically file these e-mails in there.

error.title: Splash!
error.failed: Your entry has washed up... on an unknown shore?!
error.sorry: Please try again or contact the Park directly to report the problem... Sorry for the inconvenience.

legend.divingProhibitedAprilToSeptember: Diving prohibited from 1st April to 30th Septembe
legend.divingProhibitedAprilToOctober: Diving prohibited from 1 April to 30 October
legend.anchoringProhibited: Anchoring prohibited except on diving equipment
